subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ruslan Fedotenko’s goal with 6:23 to play, combined with Pittsburgh’s loss, helped the Rangers take a 3-point lead over the Penguins in the East.
snippet: Ruslan Fedotenko’s goal with 6:23 to play, combined with Pittsburgh’s loss, helped the Rangers take a 3-point lead over the Penguins in the East.
